          <title>
            <string language="en">Fleming's left hand rule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Linke richtlinie Flemings Hand$$ln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Règle de la main gauche de Fleming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Régua da mão esquerda de Fleming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regola della mano sinistra del Fleming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αριστερός κανόνας Fleming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Regla de la mano izquierda de Fleming</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figures illustrate Fleming's left hand rule in determining the direction of the force on a current-carrying conductor in a magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fleming's left hand rule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">first finger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">right angles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">second finger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thumb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vector quantities</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildungen veranschaulichen linke richtlinie Flemings
Hand,, wenn sie die Richtung der Kraft auf einem aktuell-tragenden 
Leiter in einem magnetischem feststellen, auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les figures illustrent la règle de la main gauche 
de Fleming en déterminant la direction de la force sur un 
conducteur actuel-portant dans un champ magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As figuras ilustram a régua da mão esquerda de 
Fleming em determinar o sentido da força em um condutor 
atual-carregando em um campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le figure illustrano la regola della mano sinistra 
del Fleming nella determinazione del senso della forza su un 
conduttore corrente-trasportante in un campo magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αριθμοί επεξηγούν τον αριστερό κανόνα Fleming 
στον καθορισμό της κατεύθυνσης της δύναμης σε έναν 
παρών-φέρνοντας αγωγό σε ένα μαγνητικό πεδίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las figuras ilustran la regla de la mano izquierda 
de Fleming en la determinación de la dirección de la fuerza en un 
conductor actual-que lleva en un campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
